segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen, near the cupboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy, quite young, on a small, two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching way up, into an open cabinet where I can clearly see a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The label "COOKIE JAR" makes his intentions perfectly clear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and a plate in the other, ready to catch his haul.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her arm outstretched, an expectant look on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic sneaky cookie heist in progress.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool he's standing on looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, and it appears to be tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really worried he's going to fall and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily knock over that plate of cookies, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone else seeing this precarious situation?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
